movies.title: The Lego Movie
movies.description: An ordinary LEGO minifigure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil LEGO tyrant from gluing the universe together.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: Frozen
movies.description: Fearless optimist Anna teams up with Kristoff in an epic journey, encountering Everest-lie conditions, and a hilarious snowman named Olaf in a race to find Anna's sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom in eternal winter.
